titleStmt.title: Ten lectures on the obligation of humane conscience Read in the divinity school at Oxford, in the year, 1647. By that most learned and reverend father in God, Doctor Robert Sanderson, Bishop of Lincoln. &c. Translated by Robert Codrington, Master of Arts.
titleStmt.author: Sanderson, Robert, 1587-1663.
Codrington, Robert, 1601-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Tho. Leach, and are to be sold by John Martin, James Allestry, and Tho. Dicas, at the Sign of the Bell in St. Pauls-Church Yard,

notesStmt.note: "Several cases of conscience" has separate dated title page following general title page.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
